DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The PAKT project shall evaluate effect exercise intervention kindergarten combine educational training parent kindergarten teacher behavior health status child . Study design : Baseline measurement perform 700 kindergarten child age 43-67 month May July 2007 . The kindergarten locate around Wuerzburg Germany . Kindergartens randomized intervention ( 21 kindergarten ) control ( 20 kindergarten ) group . The intervention group offer daily exercise class last least 30 min . Parents teacher child intervention program receive educational training . In addition , child activity homework involve entire family . The control kindergartens keep routine . Follow-up measurement physical activity ( actigraph ) , motor skill , body mass index , skinfold thickness , blood pressure take place January/February 2008 , June/July 2008 , September/October 2008 . The number accident outside kindergarten number child miss kindergarten due infection monitor continuously . Use result : If PAKT program proof effective , result publish scientific journal make public use press . With help GEK , program implement nationwide kindergarten .
